metadata.title: CVE-2024-7954 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The porte_plume plugin used by SPIP before 4.30-alpha2, 4.2.13, and 4.1.16is vulnerable to an arbitrary code execution vulnerability. A remote andunauthenticated attacker can execute arbitrary PHP as the SPIP user bysending a crafted HTTP request.

criterions.comment: spip package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
